---
title: Assign Staking Data
slug: /staking/cardano/delegate/assign-staking-data
---

import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

After collecting the required inputs, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` to proceed to the next step.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object` (required).
  - `delegator_address` &mdash; A Cardano address from which ADA will be staked.
  - `validator_address` &mdash; A Cardano staking pool to which ADA will be staked.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-11}
curl -X PUT 'https://cardano-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/6f995c8a-08b7-43ff-9275-0ef8fc94bc26/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "assign_staking_data",
  "inputs": {
    "delegator_address": "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x",
    "validator_address": "pool1wn6a6f23ctq06udwhw27ravdpd6zcr7jlut3yez0wzdackz3222"
  }
}'
```

### Response

:::caution important

When no staking key registration certificate exists for the delegator address, the flow actions after `assign_staking_data` will be for a `register_tx`. Effectively, the first time a new delegator address is used, a registration transaction will be generated which handles the staking key registration certificate and delegation certificate for the staking key.

Subsequent staking flows for a registered address will proceed to a `delegate_tx` action.

:::

<Tabs><TabItem value="register_tx" label="Register Transaction" default>

The response indicates 3 possible `actions` :

- `refresh_register_tx` &mdash; If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction payload (i.e., the nonce has increased).
- `sign_register_tx` &mdash; Submit a signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.
- `confirm_register_tx_by_hash` &mdash; Confirm a completed transaction by supplying its hash.

We will choose `sign_register_tx`, which indicates 1 input to collect:

- `transaction_payload` &mdash; The signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,7,11,14,29,79}
{
  "id": "6f995c8a-08b7-43ff-9275-0ef8fc94bc26",
  "operation": "staking",
  "state": "register_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_register_tx",
      "inputs": []
    },
    {
      "name": "sign_register_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "transaction_payload",
          "display": "Transaction Payload",
          "description": "",
          "type": "signed_transaction",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "sign_payload",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null,
          "signers": [
            "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x"
          ],
          "transaction_payload": ""
        },
        {
          "name": "signatures",
          "display": "Signatures",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_signatures",
          "validations": [],
          "array": true,
          "default_value": null,
          "element_type": "signature_data",
          "signers": [
            "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x"
          ],
          "transaction_payload": "",
          "signing_payload": "33f750583301f5b298e7a4d9d42cd950be86ecd018f8df37e4fb58640d39e997",
          "inputs": [
            {
              "name": "account_address",
              "display": "Account Address",
              "description": "",
              "type": "string",
              "validations": [
                {
                  "type": "presence",
                  "options": {}
                }
              ],
              "array": false,
              "default_value": null
            },
            {
              "name": "signature",
              "display": "Signature",
              "description": "",
              "type": "string",
              "validations": [
                {
                  "type": "presence",
                  "options": {}
                }
              ],
              "array": false,
              "default_value": null
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "confirm_register_tx_by_hash",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "hash",
          "display": "Hash",
          "description": "",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null
        },
        {
          "name": "block_number",
          "display": "Block Number",
          "description": "",
          "type": "integer",
          "validations": [],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x",
    "validator_address": "pool1wn6a6f23ctq06udwhw27ravdpd6zcr7jlut3yez0wzdackz3222",
    "registered": null,
    "register_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "33f750583301f5b298e7a4d9d42cd950be86ecd018f8df37e4fb58640d39e997",
      "signed": null,
      "hash": "33f750583301f5b298e7a4d9d42cd950be86ecd018f8df37e4fb58640d39e997",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": null,
      "block_time": null
    },
    "delegate_transaction": null
  },
  "network_code": "cardano",
  "chain_code": "preprod",
  "created_at": "2023-02-24T17:06:06.083Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-24T17:06:46.928Z"
}
```

</TabItem><TabItem value="delegate_tx" label="Delegate Transaction">

The response indicates 3 possible `actions` :

- `refresh_delegate_tx` &mdash; If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction payload (i.e., the nonce has increased).
- `sign_delegate_tx` &mdash; Submit a signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.
- `confirm_delegate_tx_by_hash` &mdash; Confirm a completed transaction by supplying its hash.

We will choose `sign_delegate_tx`, which indicates 1 input to collect:

- `transaction_payload` &mdash; The signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,7,11,14,29,79}
{
  "id": "08a2f987-1215-4bcb-8cb8-1f218708c829",
  "operation": "staking",
  "state": "delegate_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": []
    },
    {
      "name": "sign_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "transaction_payload",
          "display": "Transaction Payload",
          "description": "",
          "type": "signed_transaction",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "sign_payload",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null,
          "signers": [
            "addr_test1qpspgu485kwfvhvpnk3mpvxr8vzvhnvw0jcsckcnw6rafklrhsw5y2xnks9h9x5k6l7wyjdwumqggtnvrn3dyjtt28rs0ekrpd"
          ],
          "transaction_payload": ""
        },
        {
          "name": "signatures",
          "display": "Signatures",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_signatures",
          "validations": [],
          "array": true,
          "default_value": null,
          "element_type": "signature_data",
          "signers": [
            "addr_test1qpspgu485kwfvhvpnk3mpvxr8vzvhnvw0jcsckcnw6rafklrhsw5y2xnks9h9x5k6l7wyjdwumqggtnvrn3dyjtt28rs0ekrpd"
          ],
          "transaction_payload": "",
          "signing_payload": "409f739d3afb030a23e68ac4506dc3ca8bc646474ea4450568e7dad51fd38b36",
          "inputs": [
            {
              "name": "account_address",
              "display": "Account Address",
              "description": "",
              "type": "string",
              "validations": [
                {
                  "type": "presence",
                  "options": {}
                }
              ],
              "array": false,
              "default_value": null
            },
            {
              "name": "signature",
              "display": "Signature",
              "description": "",
              "type": "string",
              "validations": [
                {
                  "type": "presence",
                  "options": {}
                }
              ],
              "array": false,
              "default_value": null
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },

      "name": "confirm_delegate_tx_by_hash",

          "name": "hash",

          "default_value": null

      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "addr_test1qpspgu485kwfvhvpnk3mpvxr8vzvhnvw0jcsckcnw6rafklrhsw5y2xnks9h9x5k6l7wyjdwumqggtnvrn3dyjtt28rs0ekrpd",
    "validator_address": "pool1wn6a6f23ctq06udwhw27ravdpd6zcr7jlut3yez0wzdackz3222",
    "registered": null,
    "register_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "e382ce19b8e07a2ba498c0afc6290dcf96bfd156f5aab2710278b3ead082a899",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "e382ce19b8e07a2ba498c0afc6290dcf96bfd156f5aab2710278b3ead082a899",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "addr_test1qpspgu485kwfvhvpnk3mpvxr8vzvhnvw0jcsckcnw6rafklrhsw5y2xnks9h9x5k6l7wyjdwumqggtnvrn3dyjtt28rs0ekrpd",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-24T18:40:18.000Z"
    },
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "409f739d3afb030a23e68ac4506dc3ca8bc646474ea4450568e7dad51fd38b36",
      "signed": null,
      "hash": "409f739d3afb030a23e68ac4506dc3ca8bc646474ea4450568e7dad51fd38b36",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": null,
      "block_time": null

  "network_code": "cardano",
  "chain_code": "preprod",

  "updated_at": "2023-02-24T18:40:59.099Z"

```

</TabItem></Tabs>

:::info note

Make sure to save the `transaction_payload` from this response, which is what needs to be signed in the next step.

:::
